title: How To Become A Great White Moonlight - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Drama   Mature   Psychological   School Life   Sci-fi   Tragedy
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Cold Protagonist   College/University   Cunning Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Kidnappings   Love Triangles   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Pretend Lovers   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Psychopaths   Reverse Harem   System Administrator   Transmigration   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   Yandere

description:
Yan Shiying was selected and transmigrated into a cannon fodder at the side of the female lead that was desired by millions of people, and in the end she was used as a substitute, a spare tire and a tool by the male leads

They didn’t expect that after she became their only light, she ruthlessly abandoned them one by one

Yan Shiying: You scold me, you’re done for, you will have to date me.>
